author: Jordan Boyer
description: Comparison of different TypeScript validation libraries
name: validation-lib-comparaison

scripts.bench:bun: hyperfine 'bun src/arktype.ts' 'bun src/suretype.ts' 'bun src/valibot.ts' 'bun src/zod-mini.ts' 'bun src/zod3.ts' 'bun src/zod4.ts'
scripts.bench:node: hyperfine --runs 10 'node dist/arktype.js' 'node dist/valibot.js' 'node dist/zod-mini.js' 'node dist/zod3.js' 'node dist/zod4.js'
scripts.bench:node:strip: hyperfine --runs 10 'node --experimental-strip-types src/arktype.ts' 'node --experimental-strip-types src/valibot.ts' 'node --experimental-strip-types src/zod-mini.ts' 'node --experimental-strip-types src/zod3.ts' 'node --experimental-strip-types src/zod4.ts'
scripts.check: pnpm i && bun check:tsc && bun check:biome && bun run build && bun check:once && echo check success
scripts.check:biome: biome check --error-on-warnings --write --unsafe src && echo check:biome success
scripts.check:once: bun src/arktype.ts && bun src/suretype.ts && bun src/valibot.ts && bun src/zod-mini.ts && bun src/zod3.ts && bun src/zod4.ts && echo check:once success
